title: Pałace zamki O/S Neural Dreams
description: DATAsculptor projects 1925 glass-plate luminograms of Schloss Oppeln & Leschnitz onto frost-rimmed pointclouds; amber pixels heal shattered turrets while magenta ghosts re-thread vanished slate roofs, letting przed wojną cudownie forms breathe again through intergenerational Landscriptum.
